altername_name: Pony Friends: Now With 6 New Mini Breed Ponies
name: Pony Friends: Mini Breeds Edition
overview: Gamestop exclusive with 6 new mini breed ponies. Ever wanted a pony but simply could not afford the price tag and hassle involved with looking after and raising a real-life creature? Pony Friends have the solution. It's a virtual simulation for pony lovers. Choose from various breeds, look after your chosen pony, take it on trail rides, collect items and rare gifts and most importantly accessories.
